apple_vendor_description: This powerful emoji, as seen on Apple devices, captures the essence of agreement and collaboration with a handshake between two individuals of contrasting skin tones. One hand, rendered with a deep, rich dark skin tone, meets another with a warm medium-light skin tone, their fingers interlocking with Apple's characteristic realistic lighting and subtle 3D depth. The smooth, rounded edges of the hands convey a sense of gentle yet firm connection, making it an ideal representation of trust and partnership in digital conversations on Apple devices.
